company_name: SDP SOCIETE DE DISTRIBUTION ET DE PRESTATION DE SERVICES
information: SDP is a French company that specializes in formulating, manufacturing and distributing farming products. The range is distributed via the cooperative and trade network and comprises four product families: adjuvants, foliar feed, soil improvers and service products. The firm has products for all crops. Research and development is essentially based on green chemistry. Several innovations come out of the SDP laboratory every year. SDP markets its products on the French market and exports to all continents. SDP is a firm appreciated for its know-how, thanks to its responsiveness and capacity to adapt to its customers' challenges. SDP is one of the leaders for foliar nutrition and adjuvants.
